statements.select: select * from InvoiceCT where invoicedate between #startTime# and #endTime#
statements.update: update dbo.InvoiceCT set InvoiceOwed = InvoiceOwed + #InvoiceOwed# where InvoiceId = #InvoiceId#
update dbo.InvoiceCT set InvoiceOwed = InvoiceOwed - #InvoiceOwed# where InvoiceId = #InvoiceId#
statements.select: select ct.* from InvoiceCT ct left join InvoiceCTDetail ctd on ct.InvoiceId=ctd.InvoiceId left join InvoiceCO co on co.InvoiceId=ctd.InvoiceCOId left join InvoiceXO xo on co.InvoiceXOId=xo.InvoiceId where 1=1 $sql$
